'''''kuluma''''' is a [[Quenya]] word meaning "an orange".<ref name=LR>{{LR|Etymologies}}, p. 365</ref>

[[Helge Fauskanger]] has suggested that the form ''culuma'' (retaining the same meaning) could be valid [[Neo-Elvish|Neo-Quenya]].<ref>[[Helge Fauskanger]], "[http://folk.uib.no/hnohf/eng-quen.rtf English-Quenya Wordlist (Quettaparma Quenyanna)]" at [http://folk.uib.no/hnohf/ Ardalambion] (accessed 25 June 2011)</ref>
